trans-unit.source: To retrieve the result of an asynchronous recognition operation, attach an event handler to the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: Egy aszinkron felismerés művelet eredményének beolvasása, csatolja eseménykezelő a felismerő <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>esemény.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises this event whenever it successfully completes a synchronous or asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: A felismerő riasztást ezt az eseményt, amikor egy szinkron vagy aszinkron művelet sikeresen befejeződött.

trans-unit.source: If recognition was not successful, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> object, which you can access in the handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> event, will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Ha felismerés sikertelen volt, a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>tulajdonságának <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>objektum, amely a kezelőt végezheti el a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>esemény lesz `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: To perform synchronous recognition, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Szinkron felismerés végrehajtásához valamelyikével a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>módszerek.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Performs one or more asynchronous speech recognition operations.
trans-unit.target: Egy vagy több aszinkron Beszéd felismerés műveleteket hajtja végre.

trans-unit.source: If `mode` is <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeMode>, the recognizer continues performing asynchronous recognition operations until the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Ha `mode` van <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeMode>, a felismerő továbbra is fennáll, addig aszinkron felismerés műveletet hajt végre a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A>vagy <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A>metódust.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeMode>

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the recognizer can raise the following events: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>.
trans-unit.target: Ez a metódus hívása, a felismerő is növelheti a következő események:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the recognizer detects input that it can identify as speech.
trans-unit.target: Ha a felismerő észleli, hogy azonosíthassa azokat beszéd átalakítás, bemeneti következik be.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>

trans-unit.source: Raised when input creates an ambiguous match with one of the active grammars.
trans-unit.target: Következik be, amikor a bemeneti hoz létre egy nem egyértelmű egyezés az aktív nyelvtanok egyikét.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the recognizer finalizes a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Következik be, amikor a felismerő finalizes a felismerési műveletet.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Raised when a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> operation finishes.
trans-unit.target: Következik be, amikor egy <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>művelet befejeződik.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the result of an asynchronous recognition operation, attach an event handler to the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: Egy aszinkron felismerés művelet eredményének beolvasása, csatolja eseménykezelő a felismerő <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>esemény.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises this event whenever it successfully completes a synchronous or asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: A felismerő riasztást ezt az eseményt, amikor egy szinkron vagy aszinkron művelet sikeresen befejeződött.

trans-unit.source: If recognition was not successful, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> object, which you can access in the handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> event, will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Ha felismerés sikertelen volt, a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>tulajdonságának <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>objektum, amely a kezelőt végezheti el a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>esemény lesz `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous recognition operation can fail for the following reasons: - Speech is not detected before the timeout intervals expire for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Egy aszinkron felismerés művelet sikertelen lesz a következők lehetnek az okai:-beszéd átalakítás a rendszer nem ismeri fel, mielőtt lejár az időkorlátok a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>vagy <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>Tulajdonságok.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The recognition engine detects speech but finds no matches in any of its loaded and enabled <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: -A felismerési beszéd észlel, de nincs ilyen talál a betöltött és engedélyezett <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektumok.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: To perform synchronous recognition, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Szinkron felismerés végrehajtásához valamelyikével a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>módszerek.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether to perform one or multiple recognition operations.
trans-unit.target: Azt jelzi, hogy egy vagy több felismerés műveletek végrehajtásához.

trans-unit.source: Terminates asynchronous recognition without waiting for the current recognition operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: Aszinkron felismerés megszakítja az aktuális felismerés művelet elvégzéséhez várakozás nélkül.

trans-unit.source: This method immediately finalizes asynchronous recognition.
trans-unit.target: Ez a módszer azonnal finalizes aszinkron használatát.

trans-unit.source: If the current asynchronous recognition operation is receiving input, the input is truncated and the operation completes with the existing input.
trans-unit.target: Ha az aktuális aszinkron felismerés művelet bemeneti, a függvény egésszé csonkítja a bemeneti és a művelet befejeződik, a meglévő bevitellel.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> event when an asynchronous operation is canceled, and sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: A felismerő vált ki a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>vagy <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted>eseményt, amikor egy aszinkron művelet megszakadt, és beállítja a <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A>tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>való `true`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: This method cancels asynchronous operations initiated by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Ez a metódus által kezdeményezett aszinkron műveletek visszavonja a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>és <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>módszerek.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: To stop asynchronous recognition without truncating the input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A bemeneti csonkítása nélkül aszinkron felismerés leállításához használja a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A>

trans-unit.source: Stops asynchronous recognition after the current recognition operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Aszinkron felismerés leáll, a jelenlegi felismerés művelet befejeződése után.

trans-unit.source: This method finalizes asynchronous recognition without truncating input.
trans-unit.target: Ez a metódus aszinkron felismerés finalizes bemeneti csonkítása nélkül.

trans-unit.source: If the current asynchronous recognition operation is receiving input, the recognizer continues accepting input until the current recognition operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: Ha az aktuális aszinkron felismerés művelet bemeneti, a felismerő továbbra is bemenetet fogad, az aktuális felismerés művelet befejeződéséig.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> event when an asynchronous operation is stopped, and sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: A felismerő vált ki a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>vagy <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted>eseményt, amikor egy aszinkron művelet leáll, és beállítja a <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A>tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>való `true`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: This method stops asynchronous operations initiated by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Ez a metódus által kezdeményezett aszinkron műveletek leállítja a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>és <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>módszerek.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: To immediately cancel asynchronous recognition with only the existing input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Csak a meglévő bevitellel aszinkron felismerés azonnal megszüntetéséhez használja az <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> finalizes an asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Következik be, amikor a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> finalizes felismerés aszinkron művelet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> method initiates an asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>objektum <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>metódus indít el egy aszinkron felismerés művelet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer finalizes the asynchronous operation, it raises this event.
trans-unit.target: Ha a felismerő finalizes az aszinkron művelet, ez az esemény riasztást.

trans-unit.source: Using the handler for the RecognizeCompleted event, you can access the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: A kezelő használja a RecognizeCompleted esemény, hozzáférhet a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>a a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>objektum.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: If recognition was not successful, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Ha a felismerési sikertelen volt, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>lesz `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a timeout or an interruption in audio input caused recognition to fail, you can access the properties for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InputStreamEnded%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Annak megállapításához, hogy időtúllépés vagy hangbemenetet zavarokat okozott felismerés sikertelen lesz, érheti el a következő tulajdonságait <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A>, vagy <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InputStreamEnded%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InputStreamEnded%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> class for more information.
trans-unit.target: Tekintse meg a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>osztály további információt.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To obtain details on the best rejected recognition candidates, attach a handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> event.
trans-unit.target: A legjobb elutasított felismerés jelöltek részleteinek beszerzéséhez csatolása fel kezelő a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>esemény.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>

trans-unit.source: When you create a RecognizeCompleted delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Egy RecognizeCompleted delegált létrehozásakor meg kell adnia a módszert, amelyet az esemény fogja kezelni.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Az esemény társítja a eseménykezelő, vegye fel a küldött példányának az esemény.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Az eseménykezelő nevezzük az esemény akkor következik be, amikor, ha nem távolítja el a delegált.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Eseménykezelő meghatalmazottak kapcsolatos további információkért lásd: [események és -Delegáltaknak](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current location of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> in the audio input that it is processing.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi az aktuális helyét a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> a hang bemeneti adatok feldolgozása folyamatban van.

trans-unit.source: The audio position is specific to each speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: A hang pozíció csak az egyes beszédfelismerési elő.

trans-unit.source: The zero value of an input stream is established when it is enabled.
trans-unit.target: A nulla érték egy bemeneti adatfolyam jön létre, ha engedélyezve van.

trans-unit.source: The RecognizerAudioPosition property references the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: A RecognizerAudioPosition tulajdonsághivatkozást a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>objektum pozíciója belül a hangbemenetet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A> property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Ezzel szemben a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A>tulajdonsága bemeneti eszköz pozíciója a generált hangadatfolyam hivatkozik.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Ezek a pozíciók eltérő lehet.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the recognizer has received input for which it has not yet generated a recognition result then the value of the RecognizerAudioPosition property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Például ha a felismerő kapott bemeneti, amelyhez nincs még felismerés eredményeként jön létre, akkor a RecognizerAudioPosition tulajdonság értéke kisebb, mint az érték a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The position of the recognizer in the audio input that it is processing.
trans-unit.target: A felismerő pozíciója a hangbemenetet, amelyek feldolgozása folyamatban van.

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the current instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az aktuális példányát információ lekérése <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To get information about all of the installed speech recognizers for the current system, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A telepített beszéd felismerő mindegyikével kapcsolatos információkat az aktuális rendszerhez, amelyet a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Information about the current speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: A jelenlegi beszédfelismerési kapcsolatos információkat.

trans-unit.source: Raised when a running <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> pauses to accept modifications.
trans-unit.target: Következik be, amikor egy futó <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> módosítások elfogadásához szünetel.

trans-unit.source: Applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause a running instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> before modifying its settings or its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: Alkalmazások kell használnia <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>futó példányát szüneteltetésére <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>a beállítások módosítása előtt vagy annak <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektumok.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> raises this event when it is ready to accept modifications.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>ezt az eseményt, amikor készen áll a módosítások elfogadásához kiváltja.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: For example, while the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> is paused, you can load, unload, enable, and disable <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects, and modify values for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Például, miközben a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>van szünetel, akkor is betölteni, eltávolítani a memóriából, engedélyezését és letiltását <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektumokat, és módosítsa az értékeket a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, és <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>Tulajdonságok.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: További információkért lásd: a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a RecognizerUpdateReached delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Egy RecognizerUpdateReached delegált létrehozásakor meg kell adnia a módszert, amelyet az esemény fogja kezelni.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Az esemény társítja a eseménykezelő, vegye fel a küldött példányának az esemény.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Az eseménykezelő nevezzük az esemény akkor következik be, amikor, ha nem távolítja el a delegált.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Eseménykezelő meghatalmazottak kapcsolatos további információkért lásd: [események és -Delegáltaknak](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the recognizer pauses to update its state.
trans-unit.target: A kérelmeket, hogy a felismerő felfüggeszti a állapotát.

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Ha a felismerő hoz létre a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>esemény, a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>van `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>

trans-unit.source: To provide a user token, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Adjon meg egy felhasználói jogkivonat, használja a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>vagy <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify an audio position offset, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Egy hang pozíciójának eltolása megadásához használja a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Requests that the recognizer pauses to update its state and provides a user token for the associated event.
trans-unit.target: A kérelmek száma, hogy a felismerő felfüggeszti a állapotát, és egy felhasználói jogkivonat biztosít a kapcsolódó esemény.

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> contains the value of the `userToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Ha a felismerő hoz létre a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>esemény, a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>értékét tartalmazza a `userToken` paraméter.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>

trans-unit.source: To specify an audio position offset, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Egy hang pozíciójának eltolása megadásához használja a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: User-defined information that contains information for the operation.
trans-unit.target: Felhasználói adatokat a művelet kapcsolatos tudnivalókat tartalmazza.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the recognizer pauses to update its state and provides an offset and a user token for the associated event.
trans-unit.target: A kérelmek száma, hogy a felismerő felfüggeszti a állapotát, és az eltolás és a felhasználói jogkivonatot biztosít a kapcsolódó esemény.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not initiate the recognizer update request until the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> equals the current <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A> plus `audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate`.
trans-unit.target: A felismerő nem kezdeményez a felismerő frissítési kéréseket a felismerő addig <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>eredménye az aktuális <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A>plus `audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> contains the value of the `userToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Ha a felismerő hoz létre a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>esemény, a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>értékét tartalmazza a `userToken` paraméter.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>

trans-unit.source: User-defined information that contains information for the operation.
trans-unit.target: Felhasználói adatokat a művelet kapcsolatos tudnivalókat tartalmazza.

trans-unit.source: The offset from the current <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition*> to delay the request.
trans-unit.target: Az eltolás törlődik az aktuális <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition*>a kérelem késleltetése.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition*>

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object to receive input from an audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurálja a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> bemeneti fogadása egy hangadatfolyam objektum.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer reaches the end of the input stream during a recognition operation, the recognition operation finalizes with the available input.
trans-unit.target: A felismerő felismerést művelet során a bemeneti adatfolyam végét eléri, ha a felismerési műveletet a rendelkezésre álló bevitellel finalizes.

trans-unit.source: Any subsequent recognition operations can generate an exception, unless you update the input to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: A későbbi felismerést műveleteket hozhat létre egy kivételt, kivéve, ha frissíti a felismerő bemeneti.

trans-unit.source: The audio input stream.
trans-unit.target: A bemeneti hangadatfolyam.

trans-unit.source: The format of the audio input.
trans-unit.target: A hangbemenetet formátuma.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object to receive input from the default audio device.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurálja a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> bemeneti fogadása az alapértelmezett audioeszköz objektum.

trans-unit.source: Disables the input to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Letiltja a beszédfelismerés nyelvével bemenete.

trans-unit.source: Configure the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object for no input when using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods, or when taking a recognition engine temporarily off line.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurálja a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>objektum bemenet nélküli használata esetén a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>és <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>módszerrel, vagy a felismerési, ideiglenesen offline állapotba helyezésekor.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object to receive input from a Waveform audio format (.wav) file.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurálja a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> objektum, hogy fogadja a hanghullám hangformátum (.wav) fájlból.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer reaches the end of the input file during a recognition operation, the recognition operation finalizes with the available input.
trans-unit.target: A felismerő eléri a bemeneti fájl végét a felismerési művelet során, ha a felismerési műveletet a rendelkezésre álló bevitellel finalizes.

trans-unit.source: Any subsequent recognition operations can generate an exception, unless you update the input to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: A későbbi felismerést műveleteket hozhat létre egy kivételt, kivéve, ha frissíti a felismerő bemeneti.

trans-unit.source: The path of the file to use as input.
trans-unit.target: A fájl elérési útját a használandó bemeneti adatként.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object to receive input from a stream that contains Waveform audio format (.wav) data.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurálja a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> bemenetet kapott hullám hangformátum (.wav) adatokat tartalmazó adatfolyam-objektum.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer reaches the end of the input stream during a recognition operation, the recognition operation finalizes with the available input.
trans-unit.target: A felismerő felismerést művelet során a bemeneti adatfolyam végét eléri, ha a felismerési műveletet a rendelkezésre álló bevitellel finalizes.

trans-unit.source: Any subsequent recognition operations can generate an exception, unless you update the input to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: A későbbi felismerést műveleteket hozhat létre egy kivételt, kivéve, ha frissíti a felismerő bemeneti.

trans-unit.source: The stream containing the audio data.
trans-unit.target: Az adatfolyam, amely tartalmazza a hangadatok.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> detects input that it can identify as speech.
trans-unit.target: Következik be, amikor a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> bemeneti, mint a beszédfelismerés azonosításra alkalmas észleli.

trans-unit.source: Each speech recognizer has an algorithm to distinguish between silence and speech.
trans-unit.target: Minden egyes beszédfelismerési megkülönböztetni csend és beszéd algoritmus rendelkezik.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> performs a speech recognition operation, it raises the SpeechDetected event when its algorithm identifies the input as speech.
trans-unit.target: Ha a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>Beszéd felismerés műveletet hajt végre, a SpeechDetected eseményt, amikor a algoritmus azonosítja a bemeneti beszéd átalakítás, riasztást.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs> object indicates location in the input stream where the recognizer detected speech.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>tulajdonsága a társított <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs>objektum a bemeneti adatfolyam, ahol a felismerő észlelt beszéd helyét jelöli.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> raises the SpeechDetected event before it raises any of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>, or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> events.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>vet fel a SpeechDetected esemény lépnie bármelyikét a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>, vagy <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>események.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: For more information see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: További információ: a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>, és <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>módszerek.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a SpeechDetected delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Egy SpeechDetected delegált létrehozásakor meg kell adnia a módszert, amelyet az esemény fogja kezelni.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Az esemény társítja a eseménykezelő, vegye fel a küldött példányának az esemény.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Az eseménykezelő nevezzük az esemény akkor következik be, amikor, ha nem távolítja el a delegált.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Eseménykezelő meghatalmazottak kapcsolatos további információkért lásd: [események és -Delegáltaknak](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> has recognized a word or words that may be a component of multiple complete phrases in a grammar.
trans-unit.target: Következik be, amikor a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> elismert egy szót vagy lehet, hogy a nyelvtanban több teljes kifejezések összetevője szavakat.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> generates numerous SpeechHypothesized events as it attempts to identify an input phrase.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>számos SpeechHypothesized események állít elő, mivel megpróbálja azonosítani egy bemeneti kifejezés.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: You can access the text of partially recognized phrases in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs> object in the handler for the SpeechHypothesized event.
trans-unit.target: Érheti el a szöveget a részlegesen felismert kifejezések közül az <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs>a kezelőt a SpeechHypothesized esemény az objektum.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, handling these events is useful only for debugging.
trans-unit.target: Ezek az események kezelésére általában hasznos csak a hibakereséshez.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs> derives from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs><xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs> származik</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For more information see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> property and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: További információ: a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>tulajdonság és a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>, és <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>módszerek.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a SpeechHypothesized delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Egy SpeechHypothesized delegált létrehozásakor meg kell adnia a módszert, amelyet az esemény fogja kezelni.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Az esemény társítja a eseménykezelő, vegye fel a küldött példányának az esemény.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Az eseménykezelő nevezzük az esemény akkor következik be, amikor, ha nem távolítja el a delegált.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Eseménykezelő meghatalmazottak kapcsolatos további információkért lásd: [események és -Delegáltaknak](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> receives input that does not match any of its loaded and enabled <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Következik be, amikor a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> kap, amely nem egyezik a betöltött és engedélyezett bemeneti <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objektumok.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises this event if it determines that input does not match with sufficient confidence any of its loaded and enabled <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: A felismerő riasztást ezt az eseményt, ha azt állapítja meg, hogy nem egyező elegendő megbízhatósággal a betöltött és engedélyezett <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektumok.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> contains the rejected <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs>tartalmazza a visszautasított <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objektum.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the handler for the SpeechRecognitionRejected event to retrieve recognition <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> that were rejected and their <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A> scores.
trans-unit.target: A kezelő az SpeechRecognitionRejected esemény segítségével felismerés beolvasása <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>elutasították, és a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A>pontszámok.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application is using a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance, you can modify the confidence level at which speech input is accepted or rejected with one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Ha az alkalmazás egy <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>példány, a megbízhatósági szint, mely Beszéd bemeneti van vagy egyike sem módosíthatja a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>módszerek.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: You can modify how the speech recognition responds to non-speech input using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Hogyan reagál a beszédfelismerés nem Beszéd bemeneti használatával módosíthatja a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, és <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>Tulajdonságok.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a SpeechRecognitionRejected delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Egy SpeechRecognitionRejected delegált létrehozásakor meg kell adnia a módszert, amelyet az esemény fogja kezelni.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Az esemény társítja a eseménykezelő, vegye fel a küldött példányának az esemény.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Az eseménykezelő nevezzük az esemény akkor következik be, amikor, ha nem távolítja el a delegált.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Eseménykezelő meghatalmazottak kapcsolatos további információkért lásd: [események és -Delegáltaknak](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> receives input that matches any of its loaded and enabled <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Következik be, amikor a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> kap, amely megegyezik-e töltve és engedélyezett bemeneti <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objektumok.

trans-unit.source: You can initiate a recognition operation using the one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: A felismerési műveletet az egyik is kezdeményezhető a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>vagy <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>módszerek.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the SpeechRecognized event if it determines that input matches one of its loaded <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects with a sufficient level of confidence to constitute recognition.
trans-unit.target: A felismerő vet fel a SpeechRecognized esemény, ha azt állapítja meg, hogy a bemeneti megegyezik a betöltött egyik <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektumok megfelelő felismerés értelmezhető megbízhatósági szintet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> contains the accepted <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs>tartalmazza az elfogadott <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objektum.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handlers of SpeechRecognized events can obtain the recognized phrase as well as a list of recognition <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> with lower confidence scores.
trans-unit.target: SpeechRecognized események kezelők úgy szerezheti be, a felismert kifejezés, valamint a felismerési listája <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>az alsó abban, hogy pontszámait.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application is using a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance, you can modify the confidence level at which speech input is accepted or rejected with one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Ha az alkalmazás egy <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>példány, a megbízhatósági szint, mely Beszéd bemeneti van vagy egyike sem módosíthatja a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>módszerek.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: You can modify how the speech recognition responds to non-speech input using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Hogyan reagál a beszédfelismerés nem Beszéd bemeneti használatával módosíthatja a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, és <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>Tulajdonságok.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer receives input that matches a grammar, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object can raise its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: Ha a felismerő kap, amely megfelel a nyelvtan bemeneti a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektumra is növelheti a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>esemény.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event is raised prior to the speech recognizer's SpeechRecognized event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektum <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>egy esemény jelenik meg a beszédfelismerés nyelvével SpeechRecognized esemény előtt.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: Any tasks specific to a particular grammar should always be performed by a handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: Mindig minden egy adott szerkezet adott feladatot kell elvégezni egy hibakezelőt a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>esemény.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: When you create a SpeechRecognized delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Egy SpeechRecognized delegált létrehozásakor meg kell adnia a módszert, amelyet az esemény fogja kezelni.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Az esemény társítja a eseménykezelő, vegye fel a küldött példányának az esemény.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Az eseménykezelő nevezzük az esemény akkor következik be, amikor, ha nem távolítja el a delegált.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Eseménykezelő meghatalmazottak kapcsolatos további információkért lásd: [események és -Delegáltaknak](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Unloads all <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects from the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Eltávolítja az összes adott <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> a felismerő objektumokat.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is currently loading a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> asynchronously, this method waits until the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> is loaded, before it unloads all of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ha a felismerő jelenleg betöltése a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>aszinkron módon történik, ez a módszer megvárja a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>be van töltve, mielőtt eltávolítja az összes a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>a következő helyről objektumokat a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>példány.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: To unload a specific grammar, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Távolítsa el a nyelvtani, használja a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unloads a specified <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Eltávolítja a megadott <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objektum a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> példány.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object.
trans-unit.target: A felismerő fut, ha alkalmazásokat kell használnia <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>felfüggesztését a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>példány betöltése, a memóriából való eltávolítása, engedélyezése vagy letiltása előtt egy <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektum.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To unload all <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Az összes memóriából való <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektumok, használja a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The grammar object to unload.
trans-unit.target: A nyelvtan objektumot eltávolítani a memóriából.

trans-unit.source: Grammar is .
trans-unit.target: Grammaris .

trans-unit.source: The grammar is not loaded in this recognizer, or this recognizer is currently loading the grammar asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: A nyelvtan nincs betöltve a a felismerőbe, vagy a felismerőbe aszinkron módon jelenleg betöltése a nyelvtan.

trans-unit.source: Updates the specified setting for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> with the specified integer value.
trans-unit.target: A megadott beállítása frissíti a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> a megadott egész értékű.

trans-unit.source: With the exception of `PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`, property values set using the UpdateRecognizerSetting method remain in effect only for the current instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>, after which they revert to their default settings.
trans-unit.target: A `PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`, állítsa be a UpdateRecognizerSetting metódussal tulajdonságértékek érvényben maradnak csak az aktuális példányának <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>, amely alapértékeit visszatéréshez után.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> for descriptions of supported settings.
trans-unit.target: Lásd: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>támogatott beállítások leírása.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>

trans-unit.target: A beállítás új értéke.

trans-unit.target: settingNameaz üres karakterlánc ("").

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not have a setting by that name.
trans-unit.target: A felismerő nem rendelkezik ilyen nevű beállítás.

trans-unit.source: Updates the specified speech recognition engine setting with the specified string value.
